events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit well and I do not want to keep it.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund based on keywords indicating a return and money back request.
Assigning a customer support agent specialized in refunds to address the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your jacket. I'm here to help you with the refund process and make it as easy as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can assist you further in processing the return?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the jacket is too tight for me. I would like a full refund if possible.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund once you ship the jacket back. I'll send you a prepaid return label by email today.
That sounds great, thank you for your help. I will wait for the label to return the jacket as soon as possible.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have shipped back the jacket and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I sent the jacket yesterday using the prepaid label. I appreciate your prompt support throughout this process.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund today. The amount should reflect on your original payment method shortly.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on your refund experience with our service.
The customer completed the survey, providing positive feedback about the quick response and smooth refund process.
Based on successful refund processing and positive survey feedback, this customer support case has now been formally closed.
